select m.oid, m.major_name, f.faculty_name, sum(ss.score) as score from t_major m left join t_student s on s.major_id = m.oid left join t_faculty f on f.oid = m.faculty_id left join t_stu_score ss on ss.student_id = s.id
and m.major_name like concat('%',#{query.majorName},'%')
and f.oid = #{query.facultyId}
group by f.oid order by score desc
